Board.name: braille_alphabets
Board.author: Srishti Sethi (srishakatux@gmail.com)
Board.title: Braille Alphabets Activity
Board.goal: To let the kids discover braille codes for alphabets and numbers
Board.manual: Read about braille.Try to produce the braille code in the braille cell area for the letter by clicking on the dots.Check the braille chart by clicking on the toggle button for help
